feed.title: La Vérendrye (Réserve faunique) - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING, La Vérendrye (Réserve faunique)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:14 a.m. EDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -3.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Val-d'Or Regional Airport 12:00 PM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -3.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.7 kPa falling
Visibility: 1.0 km
Humidity: 96 %
Wind Chill: -10
Dewpoint: -3.6°C
Wind: N 29 km/h gust 43 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: n/a

entry.title: Saturday: Snow at times heavy. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and local blowing snow. Amount 15 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 13 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Light snow. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Light snow ending this evening then clearing. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light before morning. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023
